name: Water Polo [C64]
description:
Brendon's Water Polo is where we celebrate Water Polo hitting a yellow ball back and forth until one player manages to get past their opponent. First to seven points wins!

Features:
  • New background music
  • 1-player mode
  • Local multiplayer
  • Smooth animations
  • Large resolution 1024 x 768 px
  • 3D prerendered backgrounds

Brendon is playable in 2-player mode on the left side of the screen. While Tryan is played on the opposing team.
Speed of the ball increases the longer the round is playing to challenge players!
